channel.title: CVE Feed for SMA -- SMA Cluster Controller
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SMA -- SMA Cluster Controller

item.title: CVE-2024-1889|2024-03-07T17:13:55.264Z -- SMA -- SMA Cluster Controller
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery vulnerability in SMA Cluster Controller, affecting version 01.05.01.R. This vulnerability could allow an attacker to send a malicious link to an authenticated user to perform actions with these user permissions on the affected device.
